jibe.sdk.client.simple.session
Class JibeBundle

java.lang.Object
  jibe.sdk.client.simple.session.JibeBundle

public class JibeBundle
extends java.lang.Object

A data bundle similar to the standard Android bundle.

Parameters:

value which corresponds to the key or the default value in case of an error

deserialize

public void deserialize(byte[] data)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Deserializes data from a byte array into this JibeBundle. Previously contained data is overwritten.

Parameters:
data - byte array containing the serialized representation of a JibeBundle.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the data is not formatted correctly

deserialize

public void deserialize(java.io.DataInputStream inputStream)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Deserializes data from an input stream into this JibeBundle. Previously contained data is overwritten.

Parameters:
inputStream - input stream containing the serialized representation of a JibeBundle.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the data is not formatted correctly
